short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Total Defense Traffic Light adds a strong and non-intrusive layer of security to your browsing experience.
short.de: Mit Total DefenseTotal Defense Traffic Light fügen Sie Ihrem Surf-Vergnügen eine zuverlässige und unaufdringliche Sicherheitsebene…
short.es: Total Defense Traffic Light añade a su navegación una capa de seguridad robusta y no intrusiva.
short.fr: Total Defense Traffic Light ajoute un niveau de sécurité efficace et non-intrusif à votre expérience de navigation.
short.it: Total Defense Traffic Light aggiunge un potente e discreto livello di sicurezza alla tua esperienza di navigazione.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Cutting edge browser protection

* Advanced malware filter
* Protection against phishing attacks
* Trackers identifier
* Link scanner (including on Facebook and Twitter)

This is a white-label extension made by Bitdefender.
long.de,es,fr,it:
Cutting edge browser protection

* Advanced malware filter
* Protection against phishing attacks
